alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Northwest Valley; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 6:25PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 715 PM MST... At 624 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wickenburg, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wickenburg and Morristown. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 100 and 123. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 1 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aguila Valley; Northwest Valley; Tonopah Desert
